name: Introduction to Programming
desc: Learn the fundamentals of programming using Python, including variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

name: Web Development Basics
desc: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive and interactive websites.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
desc: Learn common data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques for efficient coding.

name: Database Fundamentals
desc: Introduction to relational databases, SQL queries, and database design principles.

name: Mobile App Development
desc: Learn to develop mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart.

name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
desc: Learn the fundamentals of cybersecurity, including network security, encryption, and ethical hacking basics.
